name: @wirtbot/system-tests
description: This package is responsible for testing the WirtBot as a whole

scripts.test:local: mkdir -p /tmp/WirtTestDownloads && find tests -wholename 'tests/nightwatch/**/*.spec.js'  | TEST_URL=localhost:8080 entr nightwatch
scripts.test:headless:watch: find tests -wholename 'tests/nightwatch/**/*.spec.js'  | TEST_URL=test-interface entr nightwatch --env integration

author: b-m-f <max@ehlers.berlin>
